ltl2rabin

Class RabinAutomaton<T,U extends Collection>

  • Object
    • ltl2rabin.Automaton<T,U>
      • ltl2rabin.RabinAutomaton<T,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the object that States are labelled with.
    U - Letters are of this type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GDRA, Slave

    public abstract class RabinAutomaton<T,U extends Collection>
extends Automaton<T,U>
    Base class for Rabin Automata. Seems unnecessary, since it does not provide anything more of value than the Automaton class. Thus, this class can be removed.
